name: Touchy Subjects (Nate_and_howard)
description:
Free Mobile Version available on Android: http://tiny.cc/TouchySubjects

Follow us @ http://twitter.com/Nate_and_Howard

A FUNNY POLITICIAN SIMULATOR / GAME
Touch your way out of a touchy subject! In this funny game you step inside a politician simulator and experience the feeling of avoiding important political (and sometimes non political) issues just like the pros do! Side-step, tap dance and shuffle your way out of the heat with this funny political simulator game. If things get too intense, you better “Make It Rain” and throw cash in the voters' faces to win that high approval rating. TRY IT OUT IF YOU WANT TO LAUGH!
